original_text: Ephraim is oppressed and broken in judgment, because he willingly walked after the commandment.
korean_text: 에브라임은 사람의 명령 뒤따르기를 좋아하므로 학대를 받고 재판의 압제를 받는도다

sentences.original_text: Ephraim is oppressed and broken in judgment
because he willingly walked after the commandment
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자원하여 명령을 따라 걸었기 때문이다
